    • Uses of ComponentI.ComponentTask in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.components

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.components that implement ComponentI.ComponentTask 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ValueConsumer.ComputeAndThenPrintContinuation
      The class ComputeAndThenPrintContinuation implements the continuation for computeAndThePrint to sum the current value with the sum of other processed values which is received as parameter when called.
      static class  ValueConsumer.ComputeAndThenPrintFinalContinuation
      The class ComputeAndThenPrintFinalContinuation implements the final continuation for computeAndThePrint that simply output the result to the component tracer.

      Subinterfaces of ComponentI.ComponentTask in fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.controlflowhelpers 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ComposedContinuationI<ParameterType>
      The class ComposedContinuationI Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-09-18
      interface  ContinuationI<ParameterType>
      The interface ContinuationI extends the ComponentI.ComponentService to define a calling protocol for continuations in the component model continuation-passing style.
      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.controlflowhelpers that implement ComponentI.ComponentTask 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractContinuation<ParameterType>
      The abstract class AbstractContinuation implements the baseline methods for the component model continuation-passing style Description To use the continuation-passing style, a method must declared a continuation parameter of type AbstractContinuation<ParameterType> with the desired parameter type and result type.
      class  AbstractLocalComposedContinuation<ParameterType>
      The class AbstractComposedContinuation Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-09-18
      class  AbstractLocalContinuation<ParameterType>
      The class AbstractLocalContinuation Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-09-18
      class  AbstractRemoteContinuation<ParameterType>
      The class AbstractRemoteContinuation Description TODO: continuations in this package are assumed to be executed by the executor service of the owner component.
